title: Can we eat dates from Iran 🇮🇷 that were gifted 🎁 to us? #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: and someone gave us dates from Iran and we know that the majority of the people the are Shia so I wanted to know if we can eat them or not any type of fruits or vegetables that do that do not contain meat in them or intoxicants is halal for us to eat even if it was given to us by Buddhists or Hind Hindus or Idol worshippers so dates are permissible to consume without any problem inshallah
